data.eml:eml: Haematophagous biting midges of the extant genus Culicoides Latreille (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae) evolved during the mid-Cretaceous

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Szadziewski, Ryszard, Dominiak, Patrycja, Sontag, Elżbieta, Krzemiński, Wiesław, Wang, Bo, Szwedo, Jacek (2019): Haematophagous biting midges of the extant genus Culicoides Latreille (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae) evolved during the mid-Cretaceous. Zootaxa 4688 (4): 535-548, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4688.4.5
